name: ext_R2_Questionnaire_group
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.Questionnaire.group for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents Questionnaire.group from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Questionnaire|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R3.

element.definition: A collection of related questions (or further groupings of questions).
element.comment: `Questionnaire.group` maps to R3 `Questionnaire.item`. Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.definition: May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.  The use of extensions is what allows the FHIR specification to retain a core level of simplicity for everyone.

element.short: To link questionnaire with questionnaire response
element.definition: An identifier that is unique within the Questionnaire allowing linkage to the equivalent group in a QuestionnaireResponse resource.
